# Binmucker

> Digital portfolio and project hub by Conor Chepenik. Bitcoin educator, builder, and daily writer.

## Identity

- Site: https://binmucker.com
- Creator: Conor Chepenik
- Business: Binmucker's LLC
- Focus: Bitcoin education, open-source tools, browser games, breathing exercises, finance resources
- Contact email: chepenikconor@gmail.com

## Pages

- [Home](https://binmucker.com/): Curated links to projects, tools, and resources. Support section with Ko-fi and Bitcoin tipping.
- [About](https://binmucker.com/about): About Conor Chepenik â€” story, skills, projects, and how to get in touch.
- [Blog](https://binmucker.com/blog): Thoughts on Bitcoin, building in public, web development, and wellness.
- [Breathe Better](https://binmucker.com/breathe): Free breathing exercise app with 5 science-backed patterns (Box, 4-7-8, Spiral, Wim Hof, Triangle). No accounts required.
- [Breathe Practice](https://binmucker.com/breathe/practice): Interactive breathing timer with animated circle visualization and ambient audio.
- [Space Invaders](https://binmucker.com/space-invaders): Free browser-based retro arcade game with 5 levels, power-ups, boss fights, and endless mode.
- [Contact](https://binmucker.com/contact): Contact form to reach Conor Chepenik.
- [Privacy Policy](https://binmucker.com/privacy): How we collect, use, and protect your information.
- [Terms of Service](https://binmucker.com/terms): Rules governing use of the website and services.

## Featured Projects (external)

- [Bitcoin Coloring Book](https://bitcoincoloring.com/): Fun Bitcoin education for kids and families. Category: Education.
- [Sound Money Mortgage Calculator](https://soundmoneymortgage.com/): Calculate mortgage payments and view amortization schedules. Category: Finance.
- [Saylorscope](https://www.saylorscope.com/): Track how investments perform over years. Category: Finance.
- [My Medium](https://medium.com/@chepenikconor): Daily writing about Bitcoin, technology, and self-improvement. Category: Writing.
- [My Nostr](https://primal.net/p/npub16syt2k5uky4pxycfttxrxmwwzht2t3008f2q68kw4almjl4guu9qea8t7y): Decentralized social presence on Nostr. Category: Entertainment.
- [Handwritten Letters](https://quotestoansweryourquestions.replit.app/): Buy personal handwritten letters with sats. Category: Shop.

## Technical

- Stack: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Hosting: Vercel
- Sitemap: https://binmucker.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://binmucker.com/robots.txt
